content.text: Good, I'm doing well! Thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm well too, thanks. I'm a special education teacher.
Oh, that's great! I'm always impressed by people who work with children.
Thank you! It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm always so glad when I see teachers who are passionate about their work.
I'm glad too. It's important to love what you do, especially when you're working with kids.
What's your favorite part about your job?
I love seeing the kids learn and grow. It's so rewarding to see them make progress and achieve their goals.
That's so great! I'm sure it's a wonderful feeling.
It is. I love my job.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job. Keep up the good work!
